DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study determine oral testosterone undecanoate effective safe treatment low testosterone men .
DOC.criteria: Serum testosterone less equal 300 ng/dL ( mean two sample collect 1 hour apart morning 6:00 10:00 AM ) Significant intercurrent disease type , particular liver , kidney , uncontrolled poorly control heart disease include hypertension , CHF CAD , psychiatric illness include depression . Recent history stroke , include transient ischemic attack ( TIA ) acute coronary event Untreated , severe obstructive sleep apnea Hematocrit < 35 % > 48 % Serum transaminases > 2 time upper limit normal , serum bilirubin > 2.0 mg/dL , serum creatinine > 2.0 mg/dL BMI > equal 38 Stable dos lipidlowering medication less three month Stable dos oral medication diabetes less two month Abnormal prostate digital rectal examination [ palpable nodule ( ) ] , elevate PSA ( serum PSA > 3.9 ng/mL ) , IPSS score > equal 19 point , /or history prostate cancer . History breast cancer Use dietary supplement saw palmetto phytoestrogens use dietary supplement may increase serum T , androstenedione DHEA previous 4 week Know malabsorption syndrome and/or current treatment iwht oral lipase inhibitor Known history abuse alcohol drug substance previous 2 year Current use antiandrogens , estrogen , oral CYP3A4 inducer inhibitor , longacting opioid analgesic Receipt drug part research study within 30 day initial dose administration study Blood donation within 12 week period initial dose administration study
